## ContractEvents.addTransactionListener() method

Subscribe to transactions in this contract.

## Example

```javascript
contract.events.addTransactionListener((event) => {
  console.log(event);
}
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
addTransactionListener(listener: EventEmitter.ListenerFn): void;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                    | Description                                                    |
| --------- | ----------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- |
| listener  | EventEmitter.ListenerFn | the callback function that will be called on every transaction |

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

Will emit an "event" object containing the transaction status ('submitted' and 'completed') and hash
